item.title: Punch Clock
item.description: Project Repository Overview Our project was an application designed for users who want a way to more easily keep track of how much time they work on their computer. The program is a timer that can either be manually turned on and off or it can be set up to automatically detect when a selected program is opened and keep track of time until it is closed. Tools Used Software needed to make this work:

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! I am a Software Engineering student at Iowa State University. I am in my third year and expect to graduate in May 2020. I am currently a Teaching Assistant in the Electrical and Computer Engineering Department for CPR E 288 Embedded Systems: Introduction. A selection of courses I have taken include: data structures, digital logic, software construction, user interfaces, databases, and computer organization. A full list with course codes can be found here.

item.title: Contact Me

item.description: I am currently enrolled in the courses listed in italics.
